post.title: AI used to target public opinion in foreign elections
post.excerpt: Canada and Mexico are not building a freight corridor to avoid US tariffs despite claims to that effect. The claim originated from an AI-generated video that has been widely disseminated despite being debunked by credible sources, including the Canadian government. https://www.supplychainbrain.com/articles/42274-no-canada-and-mexico-are-not-building-a-freight-corridor-to-avoid-the-us
post.content: Canada and Mexico are not building a freight corridor to avoid US tariffs despite claims to that effect. The claim originated from an AI-generated video that has been widely disseminated despite being debunked by credible sources, including the Canadian government. https://www.supplychainbrain.com/articles/42274-no-canada-and-mexico-are-not-building-a-freight-corridor-to-avoid-the-us
